findings.title: Allowed NFTs can be more than maxSupply
findings.description: There can be a scenario where allowed NFTs for partners + 20 (lottery nfts) + auctionNfts > maxSupply. While minting these NFTs, when a new generation is deployed because totalSupply == maxSupply then lottery/auction/partners won’t be able to claim their pending NFTs.

findings.title: Fake Listing Creation through NFT Locking
findings.description: An attacker can create a fake listing in the marketplace by approving an NFT to the market contract and then locking it in the Dark Matter contract for minting, making the token unable to be bought.
